desc: We make custom-fit bag accessories for purses and handbags by Louis Vuitton, Longchamp, MZ Wallace, Madewell, and other designer and fashion brands. Our products include base shapers, organizer inserts, purse straps, strap pads and covers. Our affordable accessories are handmade with quality vegan leather and felt.

layout.text: Shoulder or cross-body. Adjust & wear confidently.
